title: The Secret Game of Nobles
summary: An all-color alternate story of the original classic, Space Adventure Cobra.

title: A Terminally Ill Villainess Refuses To Be Adopted
summary:
After transmigrating into the body of a terminally-ill villainess, Ibellin decides to find a peaceful life and a happy ending instead. Rather than selling off the main villain, Raven, to get the expensive medicine needed to treat her illness, Ibellin decides to heal the boy and then quickly send him on his way. But when Raven's father comes to seek her out, Ibellin is given a choice she's never imagined before. Will she accept it, or will she decline in hopes of finding happiness elsewhere?

---
When the villain was young, she became Extra #1 who deceived him and sold him as a slave. This girl, who was suffering from an incurable disease, tried to buy painkillers by selling him, but later dies miserably by the villain’s hand.

Fortunately, he had not been sold yet, so let’s kick the slave traders first.

Even as a 12-year-old orphan, I took great care of a 12-year-old villain. Even though he was young, he was wary of me until the time of parting came, perhaps because he was the villain. Fortunately, I was able to get a promise not to be killed.

And the day the villain family came to take him back finally came.

“…Are you telling me to go away?”

“If there is a place to return to, you have to go. Stay healthy and don’t die easily. Understand?”

After somehow sending away the villain who kept staring at me persistently, I turned around and vomited blood.

This annoying incurable disease. Well, it’s okay because I know how to fix it.

I would be able to start a new life if I could heal my illness and leave here.
But.

“You…”

…There was something strange about the villain’s prickly face that was looking at me.

title: White Moon He Made a Move On Me
summary: A sassy, drop-dead gorgeous heiress clashes with the refined, high-and-mighty CEO, Mr. Bao Jinlan. Jiang Yaoyao had a secret crush on Bao Jinlan for ages, being super cautious and discreet about it, until one day, she woke up in a hotel room with him sleeping right next to her... And then, she somehow became Bao Jinlan's fiancée. Nobody dared to mess with her in the Jiang family anymore, and the big shots in the city's social scene respected her to no end. Everywhere she went, the youngsters would call her 'Big Sis,' and Mr. Bao? Well, he suddenly got addicted to being around her.

title: Divorce Is Easy, But Love Is Hard
summary:
Ji Sina, a senior attorney at K Law Firm, is full of ambition. In order to proudly inherit her father's law firm in the future, she went through a difficult road and finally sat down as a partner lawyer, but she was then told that a guy like a horse snatched the position, the same one which had witnessed her dark history from her 20's, Sina, who is nice and kind to everyone, only has one man she can never get close to, and the person in all of these positions is Ryu Kang Hyun. Seduce such a person and say that you will inherit the law firm only if you succeed in marriage?

"I have a lot of divorce experience, but I don't know much about dating!"

The romance between Sina, an ambitious woman who doesn't know where to go, and Kang-hyun, a senior who doesn't know what's going on, begins.

---
[Original Novel](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=6312288)

**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=9608891), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=808201)

**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/lihunrongyilianainan/list?title_no=2438)

title: Even though I become a side character, I’m being adored by an overprotective duke
summary:
*I was reincarnated as a mob character from an otome game, and my fiancé is a handsome duke.*

I've been transmigrated as "Leticia," a mob character from an otome game. I was forced to take Lionel as my fiancé by my twin sister (who, by the way, has the worst personality). The first time I met Lionel, he was nothing but chubby and fat, just as the rumours said he'd be… However, me being me, I realised that Lionel is an unpolished gem with potential to shine, so I decided to re-invent him. Even if I'm a mob character, my days of doting on my fiancé began when my fiancé transformed both inside and out.

---
*I was reborn... as a background character in a romance game?! And my fiancé is a hot duke?!*

Reincarnated as 'Leticia,' a background character in a game, I found out that my twin sister, who has a horrible personality, pawned her fiancé, Lionel, off on me. When I first met Lionel, he was just as chubby as I'd heard... But I soon realized he was a diamond in the rough and decided to make him shine!

But that's when I discovered that my newly hot fiancé is acting like he's head over heels for me...!

title: It’s Finally Love, Demon Lord!
summary:
A work packed with stories that make you cry, smile, and heal. A compilation of original short stories, including commercial oneshots and manga previously published on Twitter or Pixiv.

List of Stories (in **bold** = scanlated):

1. **Welcome to the Departed Spirit Funeral Home (Oneshot)** (ようこそ亡霊葬儀屋さん (読切版)): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/72034786), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1394956053461315585).
One-shot version of *[Youkoso Bourei Sougiya-san](https://mangadex.org/title/99f1aa23-d9b5-432f-ba51-591985f76607/)*.

2. **Welcome to the Departed Spirit Funeral Home - After Story** (一描き下ろし後日話)
A newly drawn after story of *[Youkoso Bourei Sougiya-san](https://mangadex.org/title/99f1aa23-d9b5-432f-ba51-591985f76607/)*.

3. **My Childhood Friend Is a Crybaby** (俺の幼馴染みは泣き虫だ): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/79083715), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1374662950787551232).

4. **Four Patterns of Love** (4つの恋模様): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89467880).

5. **The God of Pestilence Picked up by Humans** (人間に拾われた疫病神): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/88553623), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1372125964876931075).

06. **To You at 17** (17歳のキミへ。): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/79817585), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1217750845460058112).
A mysterious high school girl appeared and sent letters to Mirai.

7. **Just an Office Lady Eating Ramen** (OLさんがラーメンを食べるだけ): Original on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1414132353115426816).

8. **Seeing the Sea With an Angel** (天使と一緒に海を見る): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89166096), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1382272880931532804).

9. **WORLD END WANKO**: Original on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1512347577408053250?cxt=HHwWhICjhfyG-PwpAAAA).

10. **The Tired Office Lady's One Comfort in Life** (佐藤さんと鬼上司天野さん): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/75086414), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1384809850538917895).

11. **The Story of a Cat That Has Lived for 100 Years** (100年生きた猫の話): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89015686), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1464174470495498249).
This is a story of a cat that has become immortal, wandering through the course of its lifetime to find happiness.

12. **Shimono-kun's Quiet Girlfriend** (無口な下野くんの彼女): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/88224680), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1367052638500495360).

13. **The Demon Lord Defeated by the Hero and the Slave Girl** (勇者に敗れた魔王と奴隷少女): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/88878648), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1377199075192303618).

14. **The Boy Who Had Grown to Hate Manga** (漫画が嫌いになった少年): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89807719), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1392419305199788032).

title: High Society
summary:
**"Please sell me. I will become the most expensive lady in Sant'nar"**

Tired of the troubles brought about by his political marriage, debauchee Cesare coincidentally enters into an unusual  contract Adel, a shoeshiner from the slums.

The deadline is three months.

Expecting this to be his liberation from the tedious strategic marriage, Cesare finds himself becoming increasingly concerned about Adel, who behaves unlike any woman he has ever known...

"In the first place, didn't you bring me here to get me engaged to Sir Ezra?"
"That's right."

Cesare replied obediently for a moment before bursting into a sharp laugh.

"But why do I feel so disgusted?"

title: Wail Of Weakness
summary:
Ananta, a descendant of one of the First Six Incarnates, can transform into an unstoppable brawling dragon whenever anything stands in his way. 

It's a power he'll need in his quest to exact revenge against the Wings Incarnate, a power-hungry deceiver that resembles a heavenly angel only in appearance.

title: Genius Martial Arts Trainer
summary:
Demons came pouring from a portal that appeared out of nowhere and caused the Cataclysm. But all hope is not lost thanks to the Awakeners, people who can fight these demons. 

Lee Jun, a D-rank Awakener, is one of them. He fought demons heroically, but as someone who inherited nothing from his family, he could only go so far. 

As Jun Lee’s life slowly whittled away, a system message appeared, informing him that a special martial arts route had opened...

title: Steel-Eating Player
summary: Steel Emperor Hyeonuk Lee, the last savior of humanity, has died. The place he returned to in order to change the future is... the military?!! Why here of all places?! Corporal Hyeonuk Lee's steel eating show begins as he rapidly grows to get revenge!

title: The Strongest Hero with Negative Destructive Power
summary:
Decades have passed since the world became flooded with monsters. The protagonist, who enrolled in an academy to train those with aptitude, consistently ranked last in ability tests. It would have been one thing if his abilities were merely low, but because he also inflicted a debuff (ability reduction) on his surrounding comrades, he was called “unwanted” and a “burden.”

One day, while exploring, the protagonist is swallowed by a different dimension and goes missing. There, he encounters a creature from another world and is told the true value of his ability. Originally, magical power is something used to attack by projecting one’s own power outwards. However, the protagonist’s characteristic is the complete opposite of this “output”; it is “input” (absorption), and the ability to suck in external power is his true strength… “Reverse Magic Circuit.” The reason he had been debuffing his allies until now was that he had been unknowingly absorbing their power.

Having learned the true worth of his power, the protagonist now absorbs monster attacks to nullify them and gathers external power to strengthen himself, mastering his abilities and proceeding on the path to becoming the strongest.

title: My Exclusive Tower Guide
summary:
15 days until the apocalypse happens. 

That's what Hoyeong Lee, a 29-year-old office worker, learns when he takes the mysterious medicine he got for saving a goblin from a bear trap. As it turns out, it allows him to level up more easily and provides him with a strategy guide! 

Everyone in the world is forced into groups to conquer the mysterious Apocalypse Tower, and Hoyeong has to find a way to work with his teammates so that everyone makes it to the top alive. 

Will his ability give him an advantage, or will it end up spelling out his doom?

title: Farming in Beast World: My Villainous Snake Cubs are Super Clingy
Ancestor is beautiful and elegant
The Gilded Cage
A Romantic Ending with My 2D Boyfriend!
summary: From flirts to mama’s boys to married men, intentionally Sun Choi keeps dating men like those. Promising to herself, not to date men like those ever again, she developed a game called ‘Dating Simulation.’ Since its release is just around the corner that she went to work even on the weekend and played the game as a developer. She plays a ‘share house version’ where you can meet various men of various classes all at once. However, she gets wakes up in the game as the female character.

title: Unrequited Love Doesn’t End With Marriage
summary: The moment Duke Argus saved her, a refugee, Miel became a sunflower. And it’s been eight years since she earnestly buried that feeling in her heart… “Marry me.” The lord said to her, now a capable officer. “You seem to be the most steadfast.”

title: The Villainess Can’t Take Revenge on Her Reaper Father
summary: The villainess wants to take revenge on her reaper father! Capella Axicon, the daughter of two great dukes, faces a dire situation after being accused of murdering her fiancé, Prince Oberon. Seeking help from her only remaining family, her father, the Reaper Duke, she's met with his ruthless demeanor. "I want revenge on my father!" Her earnest wish is fulfilled after her execution as she's granted a new beginning as a baby. Surprisingly, she can now hear her father's heart which has turned too cute to be a beloved tale...? "Where in the world is that ruthless Reaper Duke? What's going to happen to my revenge?"

title: I Became a Fallen Saint Pregnant With a Tyrant
Shall We Get Married?
summary:
“Now… I’m going to divorce you.”

In-woo, who returned to Korea from England after six years, was greeted by his young wife’s notice of divorce. If that was what his wife wanted… In-woo writes the divorce papers as calmly as he did when he wrote the marriage papers. The last month they can spend together as a couple. He thought they would each organize their feelings that had piled up in their respective places as much as they had wished for so long…

“I promised before my father passed away that I would definitely be a helpful person to my brother.”

She, Song Hae-in, is unnecessarily desperate, saying that she will do her best for the remaining time and that she will definitely repay the gratitude she has received so far.

“You are also at fault to this extent.”

The two of them are meeting each other for the first time after a long time. Will their true feelings completely connect?

title: Back to Chanbi
summary: Gyeono Kang, a lucky high schooler, used to enjoy the mutual love he shared with the prettiest girl in his class, Chanbi Baek. She was always all about him until an accident wiped her memories of the past year, and just like that, she no longer had feelings for him. But what about Gyeono, whose heart still beats for her? Is it even possible to win her back? Did she really like him back to begin with?! Somebody help!

title: For Those of You For Whom Regret Is a Luxury
summary: Exploited by her brother, betrayed by her sister, and killed by her husband. So ended the tragic story of Ariana Lopez--until, at the moment of her death, she suddenly finds herself back in the past. Now that she has a chance to do it all over again, she enlists the help of Duke Dante Heigenberg, the most feared and desired man in the entire empire, to take revenge against her family and reclaim what’s rightfully hers. But strangely, the duke seems to want Ariana more than just for her extraordinary musical talent...

title: King of Violence
summary: First-year Gilsu Lee transfers schools to run from the bullying and violence. And the new place seems almost perfect. Everyone in his class is friendly and kind, and no one is bullying anybody. Violence? No, we don’t do anything like that in this school. That’s what the “Arena” is for. Don’t forget, Gilsu. What happens in the ring stays in the ring!

title: You Just Made My Day
summary:
At the mysterious orphanage where Sheena lives, death is nothing new to its residents—girls who no longer have families of their own, who are raised as weapons of war, taught to kill and take the lives of others without batting an eye. Everyone, that is, except Sheena, who wishes for nothing more than the growing conflict around her to end.

On the night of her roommate’s death, Sheena meets a strange girl covered in blood, who smiles despite the turmoil surrounding them. The next day, the girl appears as a new student in Sheena's class and introduces herself as Mimi. Initially thought to be a school myth, there are now whispers in the orphanage’s halls that Mimi is their secret weapon—an immortal who cannot die. 

When Mimi is later assigned as Sheena’s new roommate, Sheena’s world grows even more complicated when she begins living with someone who loves and welcomes death, when all Sheena wants to do is stop it… 

A story of two girls' innocent wishes, found in a world next to death.

title: I Was Mistaken for the Villain
summary: Haechan, who was too weak and ignored by everyone, meets the mysterious child Miro and gains great strength, but at the same time, he learns that the sealing stone that he thought would protect everyone was actually the main culprit that was destroying the world. He tries to fix this on his own, but those who do not know the truth see him as a villain.

title: The Password Is 002
summary: Sujung finally makes up her mind to confess her feelings for Dojin, her classmate who she's had a crush on for 6 months. However, Dojin is unable to recognize Sujung on the street and passes by her. Shocked by this, Sujung is unable to go to class and runs off to the gym's storage. There, she meets Jaehyun, who promises to help Sujung and Dojin get closer... How? By making a grand scheme to seduce her crush with his younger brother!

title: Bed Partner
summary: Still single at age 33, Haruki Shiina is standing at the biggest crossroads of her life. While unlucky in love, she's popular among her female coworkers for her laidback and boyish personality. The only one who gives her the cold shoulder is Risa Takagai, a beautiful and capable new hire who is already climbing her way up the corporate ladder. Haruki sees her as her biggest rival and is sure that the feeling is mutual, but why does Risa always seem to be watching her...?

title: High School Gangsters
summary:
A high school turf war entangled with betrayal, revenge, and remnants of friendship!  

The fierce clash between Shin Woo-jae and Yang Seon-tae, former friends turned enemies, becomes an intense battle over revenge and truth.  

Amidst the hierarchy of high school dominance, friendship and vengeance emerge.  

Who will claim the throne in the end?

title: Return of the Runebound Professor
summary:
Magus Vermil was a scumbag — the most hated professor at a magic academy. Then someone murdered him. He never would have been heard from again if not for a lost soul from Earth by the name of Noah Vines. 

Transmigrated into Vermil’s body, Noah assumes the man’s runic powers and extensive list of enemies. There’s just one problem. Noah has to teach class tomorrow, and he has no damn idea what magic is.

title: The strongest assassin gets transferred to another world with his whole class
summary:
An ordinary high school student by day, an assassin living in the underworld by the night. A boy with two faces, Aragi Kai. His classmates hate him because of his anti-social character and weird aura.

One day, Aragi and his classmates were suddenly transferred to another world. It is a world of swords and magic. A woman who calls herself Leonora appears before the confused students, and declares…

“You are Hero Candidates summoned here to defeat the Demon King. Please help us.”

Leonora grants each of the students a unique ability: ‘Divine Protection’. While some powerful ‘Divine Protections’ are given like telekinesis and destructive blast, Aragi’s ‘Divine Protection’ is judgment.

title: Everyone’s Darling
summary:
_"In my class, there is a true idol."_

A first-year high school student at an ultra-elite school, Hiruno has to be the top student in his class according to his strict mother's order, but when he fails to fill in his first achievement test, he gets a red mark and has to take a remedial class. However, there is another participant in the remedial class...?

title: Why Are You Obsessed With Your Fake Wife?
summary:
"You'd better not even dream of being recognized as my wife. There will never be an heir from a daughter of Balajit.”

Nadia couldn't agree more with his opinion.
Thank you, Marquis, be sure to keep your word.

“The Marquis said you had no intention of sleeping with me.”
“… … .”
“So, to ensure an heir, there's no other choice but to take a concubine... … .”

Nadia's head jerked at the sound of something crushing on her.
Then, out of the corner of her eyes, she saw that the table her husband was working on had cracked.

No, why did it suddenly break?

title: Player Elimination Plan! When Anomalies Descend Upon The Human World
summary: The apocalypse prophecy has come true. A dark celestial body draws near, turning the entire Blue Star into a doomsday game. All of humanity has been reduced to NPCs—helpless prey for players from beyond the stars. As the world mutates and players run rampant, despair consumes mankind… Until Yun Qi awakens a hidden class, gaining the power to strike back against the players.

title: The DUKE who fell into darkness dotes on The VILLAINESS
I will temporarily protect the male lead
summary:
I somehow took over the body of a villainess in a novel. Originally, I was supposed to die after coveting the male lead, but instead, I decided to become a rich unemployed woman and enjoy a life full of pleasures.

"You said you wanted to raise a puppy, so this brother went to hunt one for you. How's your brother's hunting skills?"

Until my brother came back after hunting the male lead who had turned into a wolf…
–
Having been forced to look after the male lead, I somehow succeeded in taming him after many twists and turns. Now all that's left is to look for this mysterious female lead and hand over the leash, then it will be all over. But…

"Have you become tired of me?"

"No, not at all."

"Then why do you keep trying to send me to a strange person?"

Maybe it's because he has stayed with me for too long, but it seems he has lost his social skills and has also developed separation anxiety.

"That person is someone very important to Your Highness."

"The only person who is important to me is you."

"Are you sure?"

"Yes, because I've imprinted," he whispered and curved the corner of his eyes, "on you."

The half-bent, bright yellow eyes were brimming with obsession.

---
Rosetta Kazel is enjoying her life as the villainess of a novel, until she's given a silver wolf to be her new pet. Rosetta knows this is none other than the cursed male lead of the novel, Prince Sihael von Idris, who's become stuck in his wolf form! To follow the novel, all Rosetta has to do is look after the wolf prince until the female lead can show up. But what if events have changed so much from the novel that she never turns up? How long will Rosetta be stuck caring for this unruly pup?

---

[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/55937153)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%A8%EC%A3%BC%EB%A5%BC-%EC%9E%84%EC%8B%9C%EB%B3%B4%ED%98%B8-%EC%A4%91%EC%9E%85%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/3091), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60651851)

title: Oh, the Flower That Bloomed on the Wall
Your Highness i Decide My Fate
summary: Betrayed by her family and sentenced to die as an experiment, Phillie Lutner awakens the Tarot Cards of Fate, a Divine Relic with the power to rewrite time. Determined to reclaim her life, she uses their magic to escape her former fiancé, outsmart her scheming half-sister, and claim her rightful place as heir to the House of Lutner. But as she uncovers a dark plot surrounding the Relics, one question remains - can she break free from the past and build a future with those she loves, or is she doomed to repeat her tragic fate?

title: It’s My Life – Webtoon
summary: Forty years have passed since his reincarnation, and the guild leader, Girold, has been working diligently. Looking back on his life, he realizes that he hasn't been able to get married, so he tries his best to get a girlfriend, but there is no luck. He thinks he's not popular, but the girls around him are trying to approach him... (DeepL)

title: Onsaemiro
summary:
To prepare for her audition to cast in the upcoming historical drama, “Muyoung Tower,” would-be actress Haeri visits the Buyeo National Museum, where she finds the “gilt bronze incense burner,” an old Baekje artifact. Thanks to her, Onsaemiro, the son of a god who had been lying dormant in the incense burner, awakens, and the cycle of fate starts to move once again…

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=5083255), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list.nhn?titleId=745472)

**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/xiangluqiyuan/list?title_no=1527)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/romance/onsaemiro/list?title_no=2086)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romance/onsaemiro/list?title_no=3232)

title: My Wife Is From a Thousand Years Ago
summary: Jiang He, a girl from the Tang Dynasty, traveled through a thousand years and appeared in front of Xu Qing. Fate brought together this love that spanned a thousand years. Everything the girl was familiar with has become history. Relatives, friends, and enemies have all been left behind 1,200 years ago. The boy is unreserved and leads the girl to start a new life. Pain, confusion, cheers, and laughter will remain in this new world.

title: The Night After the Divorce
summary:
A year ago, Kaho married Shinya, who worked at an advertising agency. Their married life ended abruptly when she discovered his infidelity.

The void in her heart was unexpectedly filled by Iori, a younger college student. "I'm here for you, Kaho."

Though drawn to Iori, Kaho now faces pressure from Shinya to reconcile. Torn between two men, she must choose:

"Do I embrace this new love? Or repair what was broken?"

title: The S-Class Dungeon Owner
summary:
Shin Yoori, South Korea’s very first S-Rank Hunter and the leader of the most elite Hunter Team, ventures into a dungeon for the anticipated challenge of clearing an L-Rank gate, known to be extremely difficult.

Entering a role-playing dungeon that’s set in a Romantic Fantasy world, Shin Yoori unexpectedly finds herself possessing a frail young lady. While her teammates possess dazzling characters, why is she the only one…?!

Struggling with a body that quickly loses stamina just by walking, Shin Yoori wonders why she is the only one suffering from these difficulties…!

Will they clear this dungeon with their sanity intact, despite the unexpected twists and challenges that they’ll face?

title: MookHyang – Dark Lady
summary:
The exceptional martial artist and proud hierarch of the Demonic Sect, Mookhyang, winds up in a strange new fantasy realm after falling victim to a curse cast by his enemies, the Blood Sect. But when Mookhyang’s incredible control over qi, or mana, becomes known, it’s only a matter of time before he gets cursed again… and turned into a young lady?! 

In this world of elves, mages, knights, and dragons, will a mastery of Chinese martial arts be enough for one man (or woman) to fight his way back home? Or will this humbled warrior finally concede defeat? 

[Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_aBOSaO6uOk)

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%AC%B5%ED%96%A5-%EB%8B%A4%ED%81%AC%EB%A0%88%EC%9D%B4%EB%94%94/2341)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc28581)

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E5%A2%A8%E5%8A%8D%E7%95%99%E9%A6%99/59)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/31401)

- [Official German Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/mookhyang-dark-lady-de)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/mookhyang-dark-lady-fr)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B8%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%AE%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%87_%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%8C%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%89/99)
---
- [Original Book <Yes24>](http://www.yes24.com/Product/Goods/89958058)

- [Original Book <Aladin>](https://www.aladin.co.kr/shop/wproduct.aspx?ItemId=237680077)

title: After the School Belle Dumped Me, I Became a Martial Arts God
One Hundred Thousand Years of Tribulation by Heavenly Thunder
summary:
After transmigrating into a cultivation world, young Fang Lingxiao rises to greatness with a talent that defies the heavens. In just a hundred years, he reaches the peak—the Great Ascension Stage. But during his final tribulation, the heavens unleash something unimaginable: a lightning storm that rages not for days or months, but for a hundred thousand years.

When he finally emerges from the ordeal, his cultivation is shattered—reduced to that of a mere mortal. Yet, his body, forged by countless years under divine lightning, has become indestructible.

Soon, Fang Lingxiao realizes the truth—this wasn’t fate. It was sabotage from a powerful figure in the Upper Realm.

Now, with his cultivation lost but an unbreakable body as his weapon, he sets out on a path of vengeance. He’ll uncover the traitor, climb the heavens once more, and make them all pay.

title: Logging 10,000 Years into the Future
summary: At the beginning of the martial dao, abnormal beasts invaded the world. Humanity’s martials had to retreat in defeat time and time again. Lu Sheng transmigrates to that time, but in his dreams he enters a world 10 000 years later. The foundational body refining method from 10k years in the future is several thousand times more effective than the current one. Then there’s the breathing method, body refining pill formula, and sacred martial law from 10k years later… Despite developing martial arts for 10k years, humanity was annihilated! Their martial arts civilization reached the apex, and yet there was no one left to inherit it. Except Lu Sheng, he’s exactly that last spark of hope!

title: The Substitute Adopted Daughter is Finally Free!
I’m a Side Character in a Martial Arts Novel. Will You Raise Me?
The End of a Fake Marriage
summary: When Miyagi, the head of a well-established Japanese restaurant, is confessed to by Kasuga, a chef-in-training visiting from a sister restaurant, the next day and every day after invites continuous sexual advances! Even as he struggles to resist Kasuga's proposals, what will happen as Miyagi becomes moved by Kasuga's unwavering attempts?!

title: The Diligent Villainess Gets Her Revenge In This Life
